message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe is truly exceptional. Given its unique features and high quality, we're confident it would be a valuable addition to your collection. We're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $95. We hope you'll find this offer compelling and look forward to your consideration.
I'm really interested in the product, but $95 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget considerations and am willing to negotiate. While we would ideally like to maintain our original pricing, I am prepared to offer the product to you at $85. This allows us to cover our costs while still providing you with an excellent deal. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations and looks forward to your response.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $85. Would you be willing to meet me at $75? I think that's a fair price for a great product like this.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and am willing to consider a price closer to your preference. I am now offering the product to you at $80, which is just slightly above your initial suggestion. This price reflects the value and quality of the product, while also accommodating your budget constraints. I hope this revised offer is acceptable to you.
